gods.name: Horus
gods.description: Horus or Her, Heru, Hor in Ancient Egyptian, is one of the most significant ancient Egyptian deities who served many functions, most notably god of kingship and the sky.

gods.name: Set
gods.description: Set or Seth is a god of chaos, fire, deserts, trickery, storms, envy, disorder, violence, and foreigners in ancient Egyptian religion.

gods.name: Kokou
gods.description: In the Yoruba religion of Benin, a Kokou is one of the most highly feared warrior Undergods.

gods.name: Ares
gods.description: One of the Twelve Olympians, the son of Zeus and Hera. Represents the physical or violent and untamed aspect of war.

gods.name: Athena
gods.description: An ancient Greek goddess associated with wisdom, handicraft, and warfare.
